Class FlashBomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.han.ica.oopg.objects.GameObject
      • nl.han.ica.oopg.objects.SpriteObject
        • items.Item
          • items.Booster
            • items.FlashBomb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    nl.han.ica.oopg.userinput.IKeyInput, nl.han.ica.oopg.userinput.IMouseInput, processing.core.PConstants
    public class FlashBomb
extends Booster
    This booster slows all enemies to .5 speed for 5 seconds, then resets the speed back. It gets a list of all enemies from Game.
